alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 25 at 8:09PM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MONDAY TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Cascades and Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From 7 PM Monday to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will lower around 7 AM Tuesday. After this time, heavy wet snow falling at one inch per hour is very likely to cause white out conditions. The combination of heavy snow and strong winds will also increase the chance of falling trees. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades
